article_title: Kennewick attorney Cicotte declares for Congressional seat
article_text: Kennewick attorney George Cicotte announced Thursday that he is running as a Republican for Congress. He said he opposes Obamacare and can help Hanford, but declined to give specifics.

article_metadata.title: Kennewick attorney Cicotte declares for Congressional seat | Tri-City Herald
